description:
Explore and navigate the world with confidence using Google Maps. Find the best routes with live traffic data and real-time GPS navigation for driving, walking, cycling and public transport. Discover over 250 million businesses and places – from restaurants and shops to everyday essentials – with photos, reviews and helpful information.

Navigate the world, the way that you want:
• Get to where you need to go with fuel-efficient route options
• Find the best route with real-time, turn-by-turn voice and on-screen navigation
• Save time with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Catch the bus, train and ride-share effortlessly, with real-time updates
• Find bike or scooter rentals to get around more easily

Plan trips and experiences effortlessly:
• Preview an area before you go (e.g. parking, entrances) with Street View
• Use Immersive View to experience what landmarks, parks and routes look like, and even check the weather so that you can be ready in advance
• Create custom lists of your favourite saved places and share with others
• Order delivery and takeaway, make reservations and book hotels
• Don't get lost with offline maps in an area with bad signal
• Search for local places and things to do, and decide based on user reviews and photos

Discover and explore like a local:
• Explore with confidence knowing 500 million users contribute and keep the map up to date each year
• Avoid the crowds by seeing how busy a place is before you get there
• Use Lens in Maps to see walking directions overlaid on the real world
• Filter restaurants by cuisine, hours, price, rating and more
• Ask questions about a place, from dishes to parking, and get quick answers

Some features not available in all countries or cities
Navigation isn't intended to be used by oversized or emergency vehicles

Know what's ahead on the road with the help from other drivers. Waze is a live map that harnesses the local knowledge of tens of millions of drivers around the world. Drivers safely and confidently reach their everyday destinations thanks to Waze map’s GPS navigation, live traffic updates, real-time safety alerts (including roadworks, accidents, crashes, police, potholes and more) and accurate ETAs.


Make your next drive more predictable and stress-free:
• Get there faster with real-time directions, accurate ETAs and automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Even if you know the way, avoid surprises on the road ahead with safety alerts for accidents, crashes, roadworks, objects on the road, potholes, speed bumps, sharp curves, bad weather, emergency vehicles, railway crossings and more
• Steer clear of tickets by knowing where police and red light and speed cameras are located
• Share what’s happening on the road with other drivers by reporting live incidents and hazards
• Stay informed of upcoming speed limit changes, and keep your speedometer in check
• Know which lane to be in with multi-lane guidance
• See toll pricing and choose to avoid tolls along your routes
• Add road passes and vignettes for HOV lanes and restricted traffic zones
• Find petrol/fuel stations and prices and EV charging stations along your route
• Locate car parks near your destination
• Use voice-guided turn-by-turn navigation from a variety of languages, local accents and your favourite celebrities
• Plan your next drive by checking ETAs by future departure or arrival times
• Use your favourite audio apps (for podcasts, music, news, audiobooks) directly within Waze
• Sync Waze to your car’s built-in display through Apple CarPlay


* Some features are not available in all countries


* Waze navigation is not intended for emergency or oversized vehicles


You can manage your in-app Waze privacy settings at any time. Learn more about the Waze privacy policy here, www.waze.com/legal/privacy.

Moovit is one app for all your urban mobility and transport rides!

Dailymail - "This travel app is a godsend for anyone using public transport – with live updates to bus schedules, as well as a great route-planner for cities across the UK."

Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Whether you ride the train, subway/underground /tube, bus, light rail, ferry or metro, use bikes, ride-sharing like Uber, getting the best urban mobility information is critical. Moovit guides you from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, and live arrival times with ease so you can plan your trip with confidence. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike or a combination of them. 
This is why Moovit has been named one of the best apps of the year 2017 by the App Store!

Moovit guides more than 865 million users in over 3200 cities throughout the world.

► Journey Planner that combines you all transport options and gives you the best route with live arrivals.

► Live Directions: Get step-by-step directions with live guidance as you travel: know exactly how long you need to walk to your station, how long you’re waiting, view the arrival time of your line and how many stops are left. 

► Real time arrivals. View real-time arrival updates, which are taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains.

► Real time alerts. Know about issues ahead of time by receiving service alerts such as emergency or unexpected disruptions, delays, traffic jams, new construction and more...

► Users reports. Moovit’s users report issues found with stations, line service, and timetables so that we can inform all nearby riders about what’s going on in their area.

► Favorite lines, stations, and places. Get easy access to lines, stations, and places you ride and visit all the time. Plus, get real-time updates if/when there are changes to your favorite lines in case your bus or train time is impacted!

► Bike routes. Get bike routes in addition to the bus, subway, train, or metro trip plans. If you ride bikes (yours or shared) we can plan a route that includes the train or bus. 
Bike docking stations are updated in real-time.

► Maps view. View all stations, routes, and lines on the subway or bus map. Additionally, maps are available in PDF for when you’re offline, or underground on the subway. 

Ride with Moovit in all major cities:

UK:
• London
• Manchester
• Birmingham
• Leeds
• Edinburgh
• Glasgow
• Liverpool
• Sheffield

Ireland:
• Dublin and all of the Republic of Ireland. 

Moovit supports all major transit:

UK:
• TFL - Bus, Tube, DLR, Overground, Ferry (River Bus), Tfl Rail, Tram, Coach
• National Express
• National Rail
• Arriva
• First
• Stagecoach and more...

Ireland:
• Bus Eireann
• Dublin Bus
• Irish Rail
• Luas
• Kenneally’s Bus Service and more…

Bike sharing provided by:
• Santander Cycles in London
• BelfastBikes in Belfast
• Bike in Bath
• Nextbike in Glasgow

India:
•Delhi: Delhi Metro (DMRC), Delhi Buses (DTC), Northern Railways (NR)
•Mumbai: Mumbai Metro (M.M.R.D.A), all buses: BEST, NMMT, KDMT, VVMT, MBMT, KMT, TMT, Ferries and more
•Bangalore: Namma Metro, B.M.T.C (buses and metro feeder routes), South Western Railways
•Chennai: Chennai Metro Rail, all buses - Metropolitan Transport Corporation (MTA)
•Ahmedabad: A.M.T.S, Bus Rapid Transport System (BRTS), V.T.C.O.S 
•Pune: Indian Railways, Pune Local Central Railways, Pune Mahanagar Parivahan Mahaman.

Singapore:
• MRT, LRT, bus, tram, cable car & shuttle buses. Service provided by:
• SBS
• SMRT
• Tower Transit
• Go-Ahead Singapore

You ride, we guide!

Feel free to contact us:

https://moovitapp.zendesk.com/hc/requests/new
moovit@Facebook, Twitter

Terms of Use
https://moovitapp.com/en-us/legal/terms-of-service-en

WienMobil: The city at your fingertips with a single app. The official app of Wiener Linien helps you to arrive at your destination quickly. For example, with the route planner to find the quickest route from A to B, departure info in real time, public transport tickets and additional mobility services including bike sharing, car sharing, taxi and more. Display annual season ticket on your phone? No problem with WienMobil!
 
For all info on WienMobil go to www.wienerlinien.at/wienmobil

Plan a barrier-free route, purchase a semester ticket, add favourites …? Watch our helpful tutorials: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7XG2gtoE7fI&list=PLih6aZhp43P0TylJbgLVoQpHZ26tweXlQ

Data Privacy Policy of Wiener Linien:
https://shop.wienmobil.at/services/content/privacy-policy

Île-de-France Mobilités is here to assist you daily. Purchase a digital ticket, recharge your Navigo pass, search for routes including trains, RERs, metros, trams, buses, coaches, bicycles, Vélib', car-sharing, or car rentals. Find schedules in real-time or traffic information... Discover essential tools and information for organizing your travels in Île-de-France. Together, let's travel with ease.

Avoid queues at stations: buy your transport tickets from your iPhone!
The following tickets are available for purchase:

- Metro-Train tickets or Bus-Tram Ticket
- One Way from/to Airports (you cannot purchase this ticket if you already have a Metro-Train Ticket charged on your device)
- Navigo daily (this fare doesn’t permit you to go to airports), weekly, or monthly passes
- Special fares (Anti-pollution pass, Paris-Visit Passes etc.)
- Daily Vélib’ passes

Purchased tickets can then be (depending on the chosen purchasing path):

- Stored on the iPhone and validated directly at stations (from iPhone Xr and iOS 17.5)
- Loaded onto your Navigo pass (from an iPhone 7, with at least iOS 13. iPhone XR and XS are compatible starting from iOS 14.5)

For compatible tickets (Metro-Train and Bus-Tram Tickets, Navigo Day passes, special fares), no account is needed, and you can pay directly with Apple Pay!

You can prepare and plan your travels:

- Find nearby bus stops, train stations, and metro stations
- Search for real-time public transport routes, car-sharing, and bicycle routes
- Save upcoming trips in your phone’s calendar
- Check the next departures for your lines in real-time and all the timetable information
- View maps of public transport networks (accessible even offline)
- Follow pedestrian routes for walking segment

Stay informed and anticipate disruptions:

- Check your lines’ Twitter feed for real-time traffic updates
- Get alerts for disruptions on your favorite lines and routes
- Stay updated on the status of elevators in the stations you use

Customize your travel:

- Save your destinations (work, home, gym, etc.), stations, and stops as favorites
- Customize your profile (fast walker, with difficulties, reduced mobility, etc.)
- Select lines or stations to avoid

Prefer soft or alternative modes of transport:

- Book car-sharing and/or ride-sharing trips in partnership with leading providers
- Opt for bicycle routes for all your trips
- Rent a car or a van for a short period by choosing a Communauto car-sharing vehicle from a wide selection of stations around you and book it immediately for the duration of your choice.
--
Already using the Île-de-France Mobilités app and enjoying its services? Let us know with a 5-star rating!
Experiencing bugs or having feedback to give? Help us improve by sending your suggestions through the contact form available via the personal space.

The mobile application of Romania's largest electric vehicle charging station network, e-charge.
With this app, electric vehicle drivers and e-charge members can find the closest EV charging stations, check the real-time availability of the stations, view their profiles, list their charging sessions and more.

Join thousands of drivers using the Bolt Driver app to earn money on your terms. Be more than a taxi driver — enjoy the freedom to drive whenever it fits your lifestyle, and start making money today!

WHY BECOME A BOLT DRIVER PARTNER
• Flexible schedule: drive when and how it suits you.
• Fast payouts: get your earnings weekly with no delays.
• Rewards and bonuses: enjoy exclusive perks for your hard work.
• Support and safety: we’re here to help every step of the way.

HOW TO START DRIVING WITH BOLT
• Sign up in minutes on the Bolt Driver app or at bolt.eu/en/driver/
• Complete the sign-up process online or visit a local driver hub for assistance.
• Hit the road and start earning!

SIMPLE AND EASY-TO-USE APP
• Accept ride requests with one tap.
• Navigate to passengers and destinations effortlessly.
• Drive, earn, and repeat

Our mission is to make cities for people, not cars. We do this by offering a better alternative to every purpose a private car serves and helping millions of drivers support their families. If you're looking for a flexible way to earn money, sign up to drive with Bolt today.

Questions? Get in touch via info@bolt.eu or at bolt.eu/en/driver

Follow us on social media for updates, discounts, and offers!

Facebook: facebook.com/Bolt
Instagram: instagram.com/bolt
X: x.com/Boltapp

Tranzy is the mobile application that guides you through the city when you choose to take the bus or tram. It offers you updated real-time information about routes, the location of nearby stations, the arrival time of transportation means at the station, optimal routes based on your chosen starting point, distance to your destination, vehicles, and traffic alerts.

PUNCTUAL & EFFICIENT
Want to know how much time you have to wait at the station?
Tranzy shows you the time it takes for transportation to arrive at the station, as well as their general schedule.
Don't know which route to take?
Tranzy displays nearby stations and offers you options for your desired destination.
Want to know the fastest way to get there?
Tranzy displays nearby stations and offers you options for your desired destination.
Want to ride a specific vehicle?
Tranzy filters information based on the desired means of transportation.
Traffic problems?

Tranzy announces deviations in routes, interventions, or blockages.

SMART & MODERN
The application uses real-time data provided by the GPS system of public transportation means, synchronized with your smart phone, so you know exactly how much time you have to wait at the station. You can use the application with the location service enabled, manually enter addresses, or select the location directly on the map. Everything is done through a friendly and easy-to-use interface.

FRIENDLY TO THE CITY
Tranzy monitors self-service bike rental stations, displaying the real-time number of bikes and available spots in the station network.

The optimal functioning of these solutions depends on the daily planning and correct allocation of vehicles to the route by the public transportation operator, as well as the condition and functioning of GPS systems.

Download the application and discover your urban travel guide.
Write to us about how Tranzy helps you and what you like about it, as well as for feedback or questions at support@tranzy.ro, on Facebook & Twitter @tranzyAI. We read each message separately. And we answer the same way!

PPC blue introduces the future of e-mobility along with a new way of life, friendly to the environment, smart, simple, and more sustainable.

Download the PPC blue app to charge your car at one of our charging points.

With the app, you can:

• Start charging immediately just by scanning the QR code of the station with your app
• Receive an in-app notification when your car has finished charging
• Find the available chargers near you on the map and see navigation information/instructions
• Add your preferred charging points to your favorites to find them right away
• Plan your road trips with suggested charging stations and save time 
• Charge to all PPC blue public charging points in Greece and Romania with the same app

Find, charge, and pay effortlessly with the Plugpoint App. Our app connects you to a vast network of EV charging stations, offering real-time data and remote control to make your charging experience smoother.

Key Features:
Find Nearby Stations: Locate available charging stations quickly and easily around you.
Payment & Invoicing: Pay directly through the app and receive automatic invoices, perfect for company expense tracking.
Auto Top-Up: Automatically top up your wallet when funds are low, ensuring uninterrupted charging.
Station Reservation: Reserve a charging station in advance to avoid waiting times.
Real-Time Data: Monitor your session’s progress, power usage, and costs in real time.
Remote Control: Start, stop, or unlock charging stations from your phone.

Bonjour RATP is the essential app for all your journeys in Île-de-France.
Plan your trips, check live traffic, purchase your tickets, and discover all mobility alternatives around you - metro, RER, bus, tram, Transilien trains, and self-service bikes.

Your routes across all networks.
Metro, RER, bus, tramway, Transilien SNCF trains, Optile… Wherever you are, Bonjour RATP finds the best journey to get you around the entire region.

Journeys tailored to you. 
Customize your search according to your preferences:
- Avoid certain lines or stations,
- Prioritize your preferred modes (metro, RER, Transilien, bus…),
- Minimize transfers or favor accessible routes.
Because every resident of Île-de-France has their own way of traveling.

Real-time traffic and personalized alerts.
Check the network status at a glance and receive real-time alerts in case of disruptions on your favorite lines across the entire Île-de-France network.

All your tickets in your pocket. 
No more monthly queues! Buy the following tickets in the app and access them directly on your iPhone or Navigo pass:
- Navigo Month
- Navigo Week
- Navigo Day
- Metro-Train-RER tickets
- Bus-Tram tickets
- Paris Region-Airports tickets
- Special tickets (Music Festival, Anti-pollution pass...)
- Paris Visite pass

Always on time.
Check real-time schedules for upcoming departures on all your lines. Never miss your bus, metro, or RER again. An incident on your lines? Thanks to alerts, you’ll be immediately informed and the app will suggest an alternative.

Speak and go (Beta)
Just say where you want to go, and Bonjour RATP takes care of the rest!
Voice search makes your journeys even easier.

Bike sharing
Want to ride? Find a bike in seconds. Bonjour RATP shows availability of Vélib’, Lime, and Dott.

Why choose Bonjour RATP?
- Complete coverage across all Île-de-France
- Customizable routes based on your preferences and habits
- Real-time traffic and alerts
- All tickets and passes directly in the app
- All self-service bikes available
- Smooth, clear, and intuitive interface

For more information about our services, feel free to contact us by email at clients@bonjour-ratp.fr

Download the most accurate EV and Tesla charging station map. 

PlugShare is the world’s largest EV driver community. Drivers contribute station reviews and photos to help the EV community make the most informed charging decisions possible. 

Drivers can filter the PlugShare map by plug type, including CHAdeMO and SAE/CCS, as well as charging speed, including Level 1, Level 2, and DC Fast Chargers such as Tesla Superchargers. You can also filter by charging provider – the PlugShare map includes detailed station information for every major EV charging network in North America, Europe, and much of the rest of the world, including:

- ChargePoint
- Tesla Destination
- Electrify America
- Supercharger
- EVgo
- FLO
- SemaConnect
- Shell Recharge
- Renovatio Asset Management
- Chargefox
- Blink
- SemaCharge
- Volta
- bp pulse
- BC Hydro EV
- GRIDSERVE Electric Highway
- ChargeNet
- Sun Country
- NRMA
- Petro-Canada
- Circuit Electrique
- Pod Point
- Evie Networks
- GeniePoint
- Vector
- Lidl eCharge
- Ivy
- Osprey Charging Network Ltd

With PlugShare, you can:

- Find public charging stations compatible with your EV (or EVs if you have multiple electric vehicles)
- Filter for connector type, charging speed, and amenities like food or bathrooms
- Check for station functionality and current availability 
- Link to your favorite navigation app for directions to your selected charger
- Pay for charging with Pay with PlugShare (at participating locations) and monitor your session
- Add new charging stations to the map as you discover them
- Receive notifications when a new charger is installed nearby
- Find all the charging stations along a road trip route with a built-in EV trip planner
- Use PlugShare with Apple CarPlay to browse nearby charging locations, bookmarked locations, and trips you've planned from the built-in display of CarPlay compatible vehicles
- And more! 

PlugShare helps drivers find chargers compatible with any EV, including Tesla Model X, Tesla Model Y, and Tesla Model 3; the Ford Mustang Mach-E, Chevrolet Bolt, VW ID.4, Nissan LEAF, BMW i3, Audi e-tron, Hyundai Kona, Hyundai Ioniq 5, Porsche Taycan, Kia e-Niro, Volvo XC40, Polestar and all other electric vehicles on the market. 

Download PlugShare and join the PlugShare community today!

The only app that combines real time alerts with the best offline radar detection alert system. With Radarbot, you will have the best radar alerts, real time traffic alerts and specific speed limit alerts for different vehicles (cars, motorbikes, trucks and commercial vehicles) in one powerful app. Focus on what really matters while driving and enjoy your journey.

With Radarbot, drive more peacefully. Safer. Better.

SPEED CAMERA WARNINGS
Enjoy driving without having to worry about risking your safety or driving licence. Avoid traffic fines and penalties by receiving clear warnings before passing speed cameras:

- Fixed speed cameras.
- Possible mobile speed cameras (frequent areas).
- Tunnel speed cameras.
- Average speed cameras (the app displays the average speed).
- Traffic light cameras.

Plus:
- Dangerous driving areas.
- Seat belt or cell phone use cameras.
- Restricted area access control cameras.
- Potholes and speed bumps on the road.

* FEATURES:
- Works in any country.
- Compatible with other apps. You can use Radarbot together with other GPS navigators or your favourite music app. You will still receive alerts in the background or while the screen is turned off.
- Alerts only in the direction you are driving. The app automatically ignores speed cameras for traffic going in the opposite direction or off route.
- Voice alerts.
- Sound alerts when approaching a speed camera or going over the speed limit.
- Vibration mode for motorists.
- Fully configurable warning distances and parameters.
- Automatic Bluetooth connection and startup.
- Compatible with Apple Watch.

REAL TIME ALERTS
Real time alerts will warn you of any unexpected circumstances. Radarbot has a community of over 50 million drivers worldwide with whom you can share and receive alerts. Find out immediately what is happening on the road and avoid traffic jams, hazards, accidents, mobile speed cameras, police, helicopters, drones, and much more.

SPEED CAMERA UPDATE
Radarbot has the most powerful, up-to-date speed camera database in the world. Our team of experts perform daily updates to ensure that the database always contains the very latest information. Not a single speed camera can escape the prying eyes of Radarbot!

RADARBOT WORLDWIDE
Try our totally "FREE" version for as long as you like. If you want to get the full experience, you can try "Radarbot GOLD" and "Radarbot GOLD RoadPro" with integrated GPS navigation, unique advantages and, of course, no advertising.

GPS NAVIGATION AND SPEED LIMITS
Discover the power of Radarbot. The GOLD version offers everything you need on the road in a single app: GPS navigation, speed cameras and speed limits. Even if you don't have an internet connection, you will still arrive safe and sound at your destination. Get speed camera alerts wherever you are in the world without having to worry about using up your mobile data.

Where would you like to go?

* FEATURES:
- Offline navigation and 3D maps.
- Possibility of choosing a route with fewer speed cameras.
- Road speed limits.
- Alerts for school areas and associated speed cameras.
- Radarbot co-pilot. Put your seat belt on!

ARE YOU A PROFESSIONAL DRIVER?
"Radarbot GOLD RoadPro" includes everything a professional driver could need:

- Routes with special restrictions for lorries and commercial vehicles.
- Speed limits and specific speed cameras for lorries.
- Distance alerts adapted to heavy vehicles.

If you have any doubts or queries, we would be more than happy for you to get in touch with us at radarbot@iteration-mobile.com or by using the customer support option inside the app.

Download Radarbot now and become a member of the "Enjoy driving!" movement.

* Continuous use of GPS in the background can drastically reduce battery life.

developer: GOLDLAB APPLICATIONS YAZILIM VE BILISIM ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Navigation-Radar: Safe and Easy Travel with Advanced Maps

With Navigation-Radar, every journey becomes less stressful and more rewarding. Instead of worrying about wrong turns or poor signals, you enjoy confidence, safety, and freedom. The combination of map, navigation, and gps tools gives you control of your travel experience so you can focus on what matters most—getting there comfortably and on time.

Travel Smarter, Save Time

Avoid fines and stressful surprises with real-time alerts. The gps tracker, tracking devices, and hud display keep you informed of speed limits, radar zones, and hazards. This means fewer distractions, safer driving, and peace of mind on every route.

Stay Connected Anywhere

Don’t let a weak signal stop your adventure. With offline map support, you always have access to your planned route. Combined with organic map design, your navigation feels natural and reliable. The gps map camera helps you capture and review your journeys so you can always retrace your steps.

Maximize Every Journey

Find fuel, food, or hotels instantly with smart search. Save your favorite places, bookmark routes, and review your travel history through the gps tracker. Supported by tracking devices, hud integration, and layered organic map views, you travel with confidence knowing everything you need is at your fingertips.

Your Benefit

Navigation-Radar isn’t just about maps—it’s about giving you more freedom, safety, and efficiency. You save time, reduce stress, and enjoy complete control of your travels. With tools like the gps map camera, detailed maps, and precise navigation, your journeys become easier, smoother, and more enjoyable.

Download Navigation-Radar today and take control of your travel. Get there faster, safer, and smarter.

Your subscription automatically renews, ensuring you never miss a moment of enhanced app usage. However, you have the flexibility to manage your subscription settings and turn off auto-renewal at any time from your account preferences.

Privacy Policy: https://www.goldlabtechnology.com/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Use: https://www.goldlabtechnology.com/end-user-license-agreement/

Descopera statiile noastre de încarcare cu aplicatia E.ON Drive! Îti aratam traseul spre cel mai apropiat punct de încarcare, te conectezi usor si platesti direct din aplicatie.

Cu aplicatia E.ON Drive îti oferim:
- Încarcari simple si rapide. Poti porni sesiunea de încarcare direct din aplicatie, fara a avea un cont E.ON Drive
- Harta interactiva. Ai acces la o harta interactiva pentru vizualizarea statiilor de încarcare din zona ta, dar si pentru calatoriile pe care le planifici
- Geo-localizare. Vezi statiile de încarcare din apropierea ta si îti aratam traseul cel mai apropiat
- Statia potrivita masinii tale. Ai acces la informatii detaliate, cum ar fi: tipul de conector, puterea statiei, disponibilitate sau pretul pe unitate de încarcare
- Optiunea Favorites. Adauga la favorite statiile de încarcare pe care le folosesti cel mai des
- Plata sigura. Plateste usor si sigur, direct de pe telefon tau
- Istoric încarcari. Daca ai cont E.ON Drive, oricând poti vedea încarcarile pe care le-ai efectuat la statiile noastre si ale partenerilor
- Rezervare 1 click distanta. Rezerva-ti statia de încarcare dorita rapid si fara efort. 

E.ON Drive partenerul care îti încarca bateriile!

Contact: https://www.eondrive.ro/despre-noi

Citeste termenii si conditiile si politica de confidentialitate: https://inregistrare.eondrive.ro/register/terms

Suport E.ON Drive: https://www.eondrive.ro/despre-noi

Instantly compare your travel options in real-time across all transport modes globally, with live departures and bus locations!

Easily navigate your area with turn-by-turn directions for all your public transport, walking, cycling and scooter trips. 

THOUSANDS OF 5 STAR REVIEWS

* "Life changing. This app really changes the way you travel."
* "The only true five star app."
* "BEST TRANSPORT APP EVER."
* "It's become a weird and possibly sad fact of my life that waiting and receiving Citymapper updates have overtaken Christmases and birthdays on the anticipation and excitometer."

FIND THE BEST ROUTE ► Simple trip planning combining all transport modes: bus, tube, train, tram, ferry, cabs, rideshare, carshare, bike hire, e-scooters and walking. Discover routes you never knew existed

HIT THE GO BUTTON FOR STEP-BY-STEP DIRECTIONS ► Turn-by-turn navigation for all your transport, walking, personal cycling, bike shares and scooter trips. Choose between 3 different map views, see the charge levels of e-bikes around you, we even help you avoid no-parking zones. We take care of the logistical thinking so you are free to enjoy the ride

BEAT THE RUSH HOUR CROWD ► Live wait times and ETA so you'll never miss a bus, train or tram again. Follow your bus / train as it's approaching on a real-time map, see the best carriage to board, get alerted when it's time to get off, and get in and out from the best exit at any underground / train station 

PERSONALISE YOUR APP ► Save Home, Work and your go-to stops or stations for lightning fast trip planning. Subscribe to your favourite tube, train, bus or tram line for automatic disruption, delay, and status alerts

GET SOCIAL ► Share your live trip: let friends follow your live trip to know when you'll arrive. Share any location or address: one tap for others to get directions

TRAVEL OFFLINE ► Access offline the official TfL underground map and many other local network maps

EXPERIENCE ONE-STOP-SHOP MOBILITY ► Compare cab fares, hail a ride, grab the closest carshare, hop on a shared bike all from within the app. Our partners include: Uber, Gett, Zipcar, Ola, Getaround, FREENOW, LIME, Santander Cycles, Forest, Beryl, Anywheel

COVERAGE ► London and the South East | Birmingham and the Midlands | Manchester | Liverpool | Yorkshire | Edinburgh | Dublin | Paris | New York | Singapore | Taiwan | Hong Kong | Los Angeles | Barcelona | Berlin | Rome | Madrid | Hamburg | Milan | Stockholm | Chicago | Toronto | Sydney + many more in the UK worldwide!

PUBLIC TRANSPORT AGENCIES ► We use open data from public transport agencies including:

UK WIDE | National Rail, Arriva, Stagecoach, First bus
LONDON | TfL (Transport for London), Underground, Overground, Docklands Light Railway (DLR), Tramlink 
MANCHESTER | TfGM (Transport for Greater Manchester), Manchester Metrolink 
LIVERPOOL | Merseytravel, Merseyrail
YORKSHIRE | WYCA (West Yorkshire Combined Authority), SYPTE (South Yorkshire Public Transport Executive), Sheffield Supertram
WEST MIDLANDS | TfWM (Transport for West Midlands), West Midlands Railway, Midland Metro, National Express West Midlands, National Express Coventry, Travel Telford, Worcestershire County Council, Diamond Bus
NOTTINGHAM | NCT, NET

Transit is your real-time urban travel companion. Open the app to instantly see accurate next departure times, check and track buses, and trains near you on the map, and see upcoming transit schedules. Use the trip planner to quickly compare trips, including bus, ferry, bike, metro or rail, and subway options. Get alerted about service disruptions and delays for your favorite lines, and save frequently used locations for trip directions in a tap. 

HERE’S WHAT THEY’RE SAYING
"Gives you the best route to where you want to go" - New York Times
“You won't realize how much time you can save planning until you use this app” - LA Times
“Killer app” - Wall Street Journal
"MBTA has a favorite transit app — and it's called Transit" - Boston Globe
“A one-stop-shop” - Washington Post

AND HERE’S THE WORD FROM PUBLIC TRANSIT RIDERS
“Your app was the deciding factor in selling my car.”
“Blows Google Maps out of the water.”
“The head of our local transit agency recommended this app over the one her agency created.”

5 GREAT THINGS ABOUT TRANSIT:

1) THE BEST REAL-TIME DATA
Using the best transit agency data sources, and our fancy ETA prediction engine, we give you the most accurate real-time info possible for all transit modes -  including buses, subways, trains, streetcars, metros, ferries, ridehail and more. Prefer to travel on two wheels? With GPS, you can see live bikeshare and scooter locations right on the map. 

2) TRAVEL OFFLINE
Bus schedules, stop locations, subway maps and even our trip planner are available offline.

3) POWERFUL TRIP PLANNING
See fast and easy trips combining buses, subways and trains – the app even suggests routes that combine multiple options in one trip like bus + bike or scooter + metro. You’ll find great trip plans that you never even considered! Don’t like to walk a lot or use a certain mode or transit agency? Personalize your travel in the settings.  

4) GO: OUR STEP-BY-STEP NAVIGATOR*
Receive departure alarms to catch your bus or train, and get alerted when it’s time to get off or transfer. When using GO, you’ll also crowdsource more accurate info and real-time ETAs for other passengers– and rack up points and thank yous for being the most helpful rider on your line.  

5) USER REPORTS
See what other riders have to say! With millions of users contributing, you’ll get helpful info on crowding levels, on-time performance, the closest subway exits, and more.

*continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

900+ CITIES INCLUDING:

TomTom GO Expert: Escape traffic, save time & save money
- Enter your vehicle's dimensions to get personalised guidance
- Find gas stations to fill up your specific fuel type
- Enter your dangerous cargo information to avoid certain roads
- Easily find truck rest-stops

- Steer clear of traffic and blocked roads in real-time
- Drive hassle-free with speed alerts and warnings for fixed and mobile speed cameras

- No ads, no distractions, and data privacy at its best. See only what is important on the road
- Know exactly which lane to take with lane guidance, never miss a turn with easy turn-by-turn directions
- TomTom RouteBar always shows you all relevant warnings and notifications along your route
- Smarter journeys for both cars and trucks, enter your vehicle's dimensions to get personalised guidance
- Save your mobile data and battery using offline maps, while driving with up-to-date GPS navigation

Speedometer × — Your Customizable Trip Computer

Turn your device into a powerful trip computer with up to 8 live metrics on screen (depending on device size). Choose the stats that matter to you and arrange them your way.

Available metrics include:
• Average speed
• Current speed
• Top speed
• Distance
• Direction of travel
• Travel time
• Stationary time
• Clock
• Average (moving only)

Other features:
• Multiple display styles: digital, analog, or hybrid
• Speed units: mph, km/h, knots, or m/s
• Distance units: miles, kilometers, or nautical miles

Whether you’re driving, cycling, sailing, or walking, Speedometer × gives you clear, accurate, and customizable trip stats at a glance.

Eurowag Navigation is a free online navigation app with offline maps of over 40 European countries. It calculates the best routes for your truck, van, or other type of large vehicle based on its dimensions and cargo. Find suitable fuel stations or parking, get warnings about speed cams, traffic, or speed limits, and save your favorite places or routes.

No need for multiple apps. With Eurowag Navigation, you have everything for your heavy goods vehicle on the road in just one single app!

CUSTOMIZED TO YOUR TRUCK, BUS, OR VAN
- Discover routing tailored to your vehicle. This satnav considers your vehicle’s specifications, such as size, weight, and cargo type, for safe and efficient travel.
- See specific information for trucks, e.g., ADR tunnel codes, environmental zones, or hazardous materials (Hazmat) restrictions.
- Choose road types or countries to avoid (toll roads, unpaved roads, etc.).
- Are you driving more than one vehicle? Create several vehicle profiles and switch among them in just two taps.

TRUCK COMMUNITY AND TRAFFIC INSIGHTS
- Stay informed and contribute to the community by reporting and rating incidents along your route, such as speed cameras, traffic, accidents, or traffic stops.
- Avoid delays with real-time traffic information, helping you make the best travel decisions.
- Our dynamic lane guidance feature saves time and hassle in complicated traffic situations.

ADVANCED TRIP MANAGEMENT
- You won't need to worry about your truck dimensions anymore. Find suitable fuel stations or parking along your route.
- Customize your routes even more with waypoints for loading and unloading cargo, refueling, or rest.

PERSONALIZATION:
- Add and edit new places like companies, parking, or fuel stations on the map and mark them as your favorites.
- Create routes with waypoints and save them for quick access anytime.

Enjoy our satellite navigation for FREE when you drive ONLINE. Join our truckers’ family on the roads.

CT BUS APPLICATION

CT Bus application is a travel platform offered by CTBUS S.A.. In the application all the actions necessary to facilitate the use of public transport can be performed.
The application allows the purchase of travel tickets using the bank card or the electronic wallet, the calculation of the optimal route for the passenger and the visualization of lines, stations and means of transport in real time on the map.
After creating an account and associating it with a transport card, the user can recharge the card with travel tickets directly in the application, using online payment by bank card or electronic wallet. The user can check the status of the card and the active travel tickets at any given time.
A user can manage several transport cards on a single account and can perform actions of recharging the respective cards, whether it is the recharge of the electronic wallet, the purchase of new subscriptions or the extension of the existing ones.
After performing the various purchase/validation/control actions, the user will have the possibility of viewing a detailed history of transactions.
Users who benefit from subsidies in accordance with the legislation in force will be able to request the approval of a subsidized profile directly from the application by sending supporting documents. Following the approval of such a profile from the application or from the ticket point, users will be able to purchase/request, directly from the application, travel tickets with discount or free of charge.
Legal entities that have a collaboration with the transport administration will be able to manage their card portfolio directly from the web portal or the mobile application.
When purchasing a travel ticket, when it is approaching its expiration date or when other actions are performed on the card, the user can choose to receive push notifications or e-mails.
The application provides the traveler with the means to find the optimal route between the starting point A and the arrival point B, using the locations of the vehicles on the route.
The traveler can start the journey from the current location or from another location on the map and can choose their destination by looking for an address, a point of interest, a desired station or even placing a pin on the map. They can also choose a location they have previously searched for or added to favorites.
The application shows how long it will take to get to the nearest station, when the vehicle will arrive at the station and how long the trip will take.
It gives the traveler the possibility of saving frequently used locations on a designated menu page or when searching for those locations on the main page. Thus, the user can start a much faster and easier route in the future.
The application will display in real time the vehicle that the passenger must take and will notify them when they must change the line.
The user can view on the map the complete route of a line or just a direction of the route and can save the favorite lines. They will receive a message when a problem occurs with one of them if that problem could affect their trip.
On the page dedicated to lines, they can search for the desired line and then view on the map, in real time, the vehicles on one direction of that line.
They can select a station on the main page or on the route of a line, and thus can see all the lines that stop at that station and what the arrival times are for each line. They can see the next three times and the schedule for all the lines in that station.
Ticket points of the transport administration can be found on the map. By selecting such a point the user can see its operating schedule.
The application is available in Romanian and English, depending on the language set in the device used.
